Package com.jackmeng.cloudspin

Class CloudSpin

java.lang.Object
com.jackmeng.cloudspin.CloudSpin
public final class CloudSpin extends Object
This class is used for general graphical manipulation. For example taking an image and blurring it. This package is intended to replace the overburdened DeImage which has been here since 2.0 and features the old burden class style of having a util class that handles a lot of functions.
Since:
3.2
Author:
Jack Meng

      public static void colorTone(BufferedImage img, Color tone)
      This method will apply a toner on the original image.
      Parameters:
      img - The original image.
      tone - The tone of the color to shift to.

      Returns:
